Address: 3101 JAY STREET, SANTA CLARA, California, 95054, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Ambarella is a leading developer of semiconductor solutions for video that enable high-definition, or HD, video capture, analysis, sharing and display. In the last ten years, we have primarily focused on providing video and image processors for professional and consumer camera devices, such as internet protocol, or IP, security cameras, wearable sports cameras, drones and aftermarket automotive video recorders. Over the last several years, our development efforts have focused on creating advanced artificial intelligence, or AI, computer vision algorithms and high-performance, low-power hardware platforms to enhance processing acceleration, which we refer to as our CVflow(TM) architecture.  ...
